entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 7.1°C

Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4.
